pagetitle: "Data"
description: |
  A table of datasets that have been published through the openwashdata 
  community or are currently in development.

::: {.cell}

:::



## Data

The table on this pages shows data that is published following our R data package workflow. Each data set comes with its own website and rich documentation to increase reusability. 


::: {.cell}

:::


:::{.column-page}

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


| id|name                   |location     |status     |description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |published         |website                                                 |
|--:|:----------------------|:------------|:----------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-----------------|:-------------------------------------------------------|
|  1|wasteskipsblantyre     |Malawi       |published  |Data on locations of the publicly accessible waste skips in Blantyre, Malawi collected in 2021.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |02. August 2023   |<https://openwashdata.github.io/wasteskipsblantyre>     |
|  2|fsmglobal              |Global       |published  |Populations of 175 countries requiring different faecal sludge emptying services.                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |02. August 2023   |<https://openwashdata.github.io/fsmglobal>              |
|  3|biogasoutcomesmalawi   |Malawi       |published  |Data for 61 semi-structured interviews with biogas owners in Malawi.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |28. August 2023   |<https://openwashdata.github.io/biogasoutcomesmalawi>   |
|  4|cbssuitabilityhaiti    |Haiti        |published  |Spatial data to support an analysis of suitability of container-based sanitation in flood prone areas of Haiti.                                                                                                                                                                                      |19. September 2023|<https://openwashdata.github.io/cbssuitabilityhaiti>    |
|  5|waterpumpkwale         |Kenya        |published  |Weekly volume of water pumped for handpumps monitored with Smart Handpump technology, Kwale County, Kenya                                                                                                                                                                                            |20. September 2023|<https://openwashdata.github.io/waterpumpkwale>         |
|  6|grdwtrsmpkwale         |Kenya        |published  |Groundwater analysis from 2016 in Kwale, Kenya                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |20. September 2023|<https://openwashdata.github.io/grdwtrsmpkwale>         |
|  7|universityrankingafrica|Global       |published  |Data from institutional and national levels was combined into a dataset to provide a comprehensive characterization of the top ranked Universities of every African country.                                                                                                                         |05. December 2023 |<https://openwashdata.github.io/universityrankingafrica>|
|  8|basisghana             |Ghana        |published  |Open defecation free (ODF) communities in Ghana in 2017.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |14. December 2023 |<https://openwashdata.github.io/basisghana>             |
|  9|cleanteamghana         |Ghana        |published  |User experience of the Clean Team Ghana’s container-based sanitation service in Kumasi, Ghana.                                                                                                                                                                                                       |28. December 2023 |<https://openwashdata.github.io/cleanteamghana>         |
| 10|chckapmalawi           |Malawi       |published  |Community Health Club Knowledge Attitude Practice Survey Malawi                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |04. January 2024  |<https://openwashdata.github.io/chckapmalawi>           |
| 11|gdho                   |Global       |published  |A dataset of global humanitarian organizations collected by Humanitarian Outcomes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |29. February 2024 |<https://openwashdata.github.io/gdho>                   |
| 12|rwpfunctionality       |Global       |published  |Water point monitoring data associated with the paper "Rural water point functionality estimates and associations: evidence from nine countries in sub-Saharan Africa and South Asia".                                                                                                               |26. March 2024    |<https://openwashdata.github.io/rwpfunctionality>       |
| 13|washopenresearch       |Global       |published  |Dataset about open research data availability in Water, Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH).                                                                                                                                                                                                               |13. May 2024      |<https://openwashdata.github.io/washopenresearch>       |
| 14|washinvestments        |Global       |published  |Dataset on multilateral development bank (MDB) investment in water supply and sanitation associated with the paper "Multilateral development banks investment behaviour in water and sanitation: Findings and lessons from 60 years of investment projects in Africa and Asia" (Heidler et al. 2023).|16. May 2024      |<https://openwashdata.github.io/washinvestments>        |
| 15|ugabore                |Uganda       |published  |Borehole repair data from central Uganda associated with a project report completed by Joseph Lwere for the “data science for openwashdata” course                                                                                                                                                   |24. June 2024     |<https://openwashdata.github.io/ugabore>                |
| 16|boreholefuncmwi        |Malawi       |published  |Data about the survey on borehole functionality in Karonga district, Malawi.                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |03. July 2024     |<https://openwashdata.github.io/boreholefuncmwi>        |
| 17|waschoolpiracema       |Brazil       |published  |Data about the water supply, the sewage disposal, the waste collection and the sanitary equipment of the schools in Piracema, Brazil.                                                                                                                                                                |09. July 2024     |<https://openwashdata.github.io/waschoolpiracema>       |
| 18|saniabidjan            |Cote d'lvoire|published  |Data about household survey of managing sanitation facilities in Abidjan, Cote d’Ivoire.                                                                                                                                                                                                             |30. July 2024     |<https://openwashdata.github.io/saniabidjan>            |
| 19|portawaterperu         |Peru         |published  |Data about a preliminary review of the portable water system in Peru.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |30. July 2024     |<https://openwashdata.github.io/portawaterperu>         |

|   |climatevulnerabilitykhm|Cambodia     |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/climatevulnerabilitykhm>)|Data on Effects of Climate Vulnerability on Sanitation Access, Sanitation Infrastructure Functionality and Households’ Fecal Sludge Management Practices in Rural Cambodia.                                                                                                                          |                  |                                                        |

|   |whatawaste             |Global       |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/whatawaste>)|Data about a global project What a Waste that aggregated data on solid waste management from around the world                                                                                                                                                                                        |                  |                                                        |
|   |wsabrazil              |Brazil       |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/wsabrazil>)|Dataset about wastewater management and household infrastructure from various Brazilian regions.                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                  |                                                        |
|   |watercostaccra         |Ghana        |[in-progress](<https://github.com/openwashdata/watercostaccra>)|Data about the surveys on household water costs, coping mechanisms, and water point estimates in Accra, Ghana.                                                                                                                                                                                       |                  |                                                        |
